content:
It seems there is a bug on Zulip happens on Firefox that I can't open #rust-survey-2019 stream, because this message contains an invalid URL (the "main survey doc" one). Chrome works fine because it incorrectly thinks the URL is valid.

Could someone helps correct that message (probably remove the link) so that it can be opened again on Firefox?
@nikomatsakis, you might be the only one able to edit this message (might need to change the org settings temporarily to do so).
@Xidorn Quan do you know if there is an upstream Zulip bug for this?
@davidtwco I've send a bug report to their security email, as this can potentially be used as a DoS attack vector.
Looks like Zulip has now fixed this issue :D
was going to post a thing here but I guess I forgot
